cause.description:
This cause is to promote the idea of the individual. The responsibility of the individual and the realization that you are completely alone at all times. As an individual it is your responsibility to be aware that you alone can control your thoughts. As an individual it is your responsibility to be aware that you alone can control your actions. As an individual it is your right to be content.
1. To be aware of yourself
2. To be kind to yourself
3. To take full Responsibility of your own thoughts and actions.
cause.mission: To Come to the realization that we are all one people on one stone at the edge of the Universe. To be accountable to ourselves is to be accountable to others.
cause.name: Individual Awareness
